TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities on Mars and Venus
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in the solar system
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in the Oort Cloud and Transtellar space
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in the Orion Arm and Milky Way
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in the Milky Way and Universe
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in the Universe and beyond
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]Can build cities in extragalactic space, Distant Cosmos and Hyperspace. Upon settling transforms terrain into Hyperspace
An attack ship for the solar system. Meant for invading O'Neill colonies.
Advanced worker. A swarm of solar-powered nanobots that can move freely throughout the Solar System.
This highly advanced worker can freely move about all terrains and build almost anything in space.
The Chronoformimg Ship is capable of manipulating space and time, creating portals outside of ordinary spacetime.
An attack ship for cislunar space. Meant for invading space stations.
An attack ship for interstellar space. Meant for invading colonies.
An attack ship for interstellar space. Meant for invading colonies.
The ultimate offensive unit. Can traverse any territory.
Basic defender for solar system colonies.
Basic defensive unit for hyperspace colonies.
Works Cislunar Space and can harvest asteroids
Works Cislunar Space and can harvest asteroids
An asteroid captured for economic use.
An comet captured for economic use.
Build asteroid buildings. The Captured Comet does the same things as Captured Asteroid but a bit better.
A swarm of bacteria that can cross interstellar voids.
Planned for use in Cosmic and Transcendent Era evolution.
A swarm of advanced life that can cross intergalactic voids.
Planned for use in Cosmic and Transcendent Era evolution.
A swarm of energy that can cross interdimensional voids.
Planned for use in Cosmic and Transcendent Era evolution.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
These brave workers go out into space.
The Work Crew units help accelerate the growth of space cities by adding production.
This is a satellite, your first unit that can go into space.
Send to low-Earth orbit, then explore.
This is a space shuttle. Its primary job is construction and resupply of your space stations.
Build space stations in low-Earth orbit or conduct missions on space stations.
This heavy, commercially-developed rocket is an upgrade to your old space shuttles.
Build space stations in low-Earth orbit or conduct missions on space stations.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]While this unit can be built on Earth, it is useful only outside of Earth.[NEWLINE]Upgrade to a space settler on Space Station Lv. 3
An interplanetary probe to explore the Solar System
Send to another planet, then explore.
An interstellar probe to explore nearby stars
Send to another star, then explore.
A Bracewell probe to explore the galaxy. This is a self-replicating, artificially intelligent device.
Send to the Orion Arm or beyond, then explore.
The Von Neumann probe is more advanced than the Bracewell probe. It can seed life and travel to nearby galaxies.
Send to another galaxy, then explore.
The Quantum Probe uses quantum ramjet technology to break the boundaries of the observable universe.
Send to distant cosmos, then explore.
The Interdimensional Probe can explore hyperspace and other exotic locations.
A reward for completing orbital exploration
A reward from your Low Earth Orbit space station
A reward from your Low Earth Orbit space station
A reward from your Low Earth Orbit space station
A reward from exploring cislunar space
A reward from exploring the Moon
A reward from exploring the inner Solar System
A reward from exploring the outer Solar System
A reward from exploring Transneptunian space
A reward from exploring interstellar space
A reward from exploring galactic space
A reward from exploring intergalactic space
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A reward for completing planetary exploration
A mine on the surface of Venus. It is very challenging to build due to the intense heat, pressure, and corrosive atmosphere at the surface.
A high-tech farm that floats on the clouds of Venus.
A Dyson Sphere is a solar collector that encompasses an entire star.
A military base in cislunar space.
A large military base in solar orbit.
A military base in interstellar space.
A military base in intergalactic space.
A city that exists in the distant past.
A city that exists in the distant future.
A factory that lives in branespace.
What do your digital, dematerialized post-post-transhumanoids eat anyway? This late in the game there is still a food mechanism, so they must eat something.
This is a mysterious spirit realm.
A trading post in orbit around the Sun
This device extracts material from the outer atmosphere of a gas giant.
This massive city floats effortlessly over the clouds of a gas giant.
This mysterious facility harvests dark energy.
The true vacuum at a lower energy level than the false metastable vacuum.
This base is a town on an outer Solar System moon.
A megastructure on some outer lunar moon.
This asteroid or other such object has been terraformed.
A completely artificial planet, assembled from stray material in the stellar neighborhood.
Harvest material directly from a star.
It is hard to colonize a blue supergiant due to its intense heat, X-ray radiation, and unstable characteristics. But here you go.
This device extracts material and energy directly from the Sun.
A city on a neutron star? It can be done with Neutronium.
Using some unknown exotic lifeforms, this neutron star has been made into a functioning ecosystem.
A trading post on a rogue planet
Harnessing the resources released from an induced supernova
A terraformed planet in the galactic vicinity
Life has been spread throughout this galaxy.
A brown dwarf that has been ignited into a red dwarf
A research base that studies biology, geology, and other sciences on distant planets.
A research base that studies biology, geology, and other sciences on distant galaxies.
A research base that studies biology, geology, and other sciences beyond the cosmic horizon.
An expanded module for a cislunar colony.
A satellite station to an O'Neill cylinder.
This is a Moon-sized arcology that is large enough to generate a substantial amount of gravity.
A colony of the regional interstellar power.
A colony spanning an entire supercluster.
This colony spans at least to the cosmic horizon of a central point. You think that's enough?
A parallel universe has been colonized or created as a colony
This indescribable time manifold is home to a vast civilization.
An array of solar panels on Mercury. Due to the heat, they require special engineering, but they collect a lot of power.
This small town on the surface of Mercury is a rough place to live.
Launch a satellite into geosynchronous orbit or beyond
Explore the surface of the Moon
Explore the space in the Solar System beyond Neptune
Explore the interstellar space near the Sun
Explore the far reaches of the galaxy
Search for life beyond the Solar System

The ruins of a not-very-advanced civilization lie here. Maybe they had a nuclear war, or they collapsed from resources shortages, or they didn't build enough policing units and crime got too high. You may never know.

The ruins of a spacefaring civilization lie here. It's not clear whether they died out or chose to abandon this structure. For that matter, you aren't entirely sure what it is, though it looks like some sort of Dyson Sphere.

The universe is very large (citation needed), and therefore there are many extremely unusual lifeforms and objects to be found in the distant cosmos. Whale-like creatres that are millions of kilometers across and capable of crossing the interstellar void are just one.
Several places in the Solar System, including Mars, Europa, Titan, and Enceladus could conceivably host single-celled life.
These are not edible blueberries. They are especially rich deposits of useful metals.
This asteroid is especially high in metal content, which is useful for mining.
Organic Volatiles are compounds that are useful for synthesizing life.
Xenofauna is animal life that originated in a planet other than Earth. It is distinct from lifeforms that are engineered by humans and living off Earth.
Xenoflora is plant life that originated in a planet other than Earth. It is distinct from lifeforms that are engineered by humans and living off Earth.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_YELLOW]HELP: [COLOR_REVERT]While this unit can be built on Earth, it is useful only outside of Earth.
Transforms the Supply Ship into a Bulldozer to connect resources to your city on the moon.
TEXT.French: Transforme le Vaisseau Spatial en Bulldozer pour connecter des ressources à votre ville sur la lune.

TEXT.English: Will transform the Supply Ship into a Bulldozer.
TEXT.French: Va Transformer le Vaisseau Spatial en Bulldozer.

TEXT.English: Your Supply Ship was transformed into a Bulldozer.
TEXT.French: Votre Vaisseau Spatial a été transformé en Bulldozer.
